item.tinkers_things.shovel.description: The Shovel is a basic digging tool. It sends monsters flying and has more space for upgrades.
item.tinkers_things.halberd.description: The Halberd is a reach weapon designed for dealing powerful blows to far away opponents.
modifier.tinkers_things.range.descriptio: Tool is extra long, allowing attacking far away monsters
item.tinkers_things.shortbow.description: The Shortbow is a lightweight bow. It is not as strong or accurate as its ranged counterparts, but makes up for it in ease of drawing while moving.
item.tinkers_things.large_repair_kit_red: Large Repair Kit Red Sand Cast
modifier.tinkers_things.fortified.descri: Tool has boosted stats, mining level, and can be repaired with copper
modifier.tinkers_things.enhanced.require: Enhanced requires fortified to be applied first
modifier.tinkers_things.blinding.descrip: Arrows cause the target to be temporarily blinded
modifier.tinkers_things.tracing.descript: Target will glow for a few seconds, making them easier to track
modifier.tinkers_things.venom.descriptio: Target will be poisoned, causing damage over time
modifier.tinkers_things.weakness.descrip: Target will be temporarily weakened, reducing attack damage
modifier.tinkers_things.stowing.descript: Tool gains an additional 9 slots of storage
modifier.tinkers_things.pouch.descriptio: Tools gains an additional 3 slots of storage
material.tinkers_things.hematite.flavor: Bloodstone, thought a myth by many and feared by more
material.tinkers_things.hematite.encyclo: Grants two additional upgrade slots, at the cost of -3 undead damage and -6 mining speed against ores, logs, and dirt
material.tinkers_things.veinline.ranged: Grants an additional upgrade slot at the cost of accuracy
modifier.tinkers_things.hemodynamic.desc: Tool gains an additional upgrade slot, but at what cost?
modifier.tinkers_things.hemophilic.descr: Tool does less damage against undead
modifier.tinkers_things.hemotoxins.descr: Tool is less effective against ores, logs, and dirt
